alert.note: Alert for East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 21 at 8:42PM MST until December 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...East Platte County including the cities of Wheatland and Glendo. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
